CustomField.description: Field to enter all Notes related to Photo Production of Opp Use 'Notes' module and creating New Note. Notes in Notes module organized by date created, can contain relevant Titles, can be Shared + added to Records.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to enter all Notes related to Photo Production of Opp Use 'Notes' module and creating New Note. Notes in Notes module organized by date created, can contain relevant Titles, can be Shared + added to Records.
CustomField.label: zNote - Photo Production
